newsitem.title: USA: Armco names Jerry Albright CFO.
newsitem.headline: Armco names Jerry Albright CFO.

text.p: Armco Inc said Monday Jerry Albright was appointed vice president and chief financial officer, effective January 1.
Albright is a certified public accountant and is a graduate of Miami University in Ohio, according to Armco's press release.
He replaces David Harmer, who is leaving Armco to become president of Jetway Systems in Ogden, Utah, Armco said. Jetway Systems is a unit of FMC Corp.
Albright served as vice president and chief financial officer at Cyclops Industries Inc from August 1988 until Cyclops was acquired by Armco in April 1992, Armco said.
